title: Updates on Carolingian UI
content:
Version 2.6.0:

  • Force Dark Mode: You can now try to force Dark Mode on modules that don't have it (experimental).
  • Sidebar Width: You can now adjust the width of sidebar panel in settings!
  • Hide Inactive Scenes: Toggled scenes will be hidden when folders are open, to avoid duplication - disable this in settings.
  • Simple Timekeeping & Calendar: Added adjustment to the module for use with Scene Navigation.

Join us on Discord or visit the Github repository.
